settings.text: Forged for Battle. Built to Go Harder.
settings.text_fallback: Forged for Battle. Built to Go Harder.

settings.text: Designed in collaboration with NBA center Isaiah Stewart, the new X1 Warrior Red colorway channels the intensity and discipline that fuels his game. Lightweight, flexible, and zero-drop, it’s the perfect armor for going into battle, and a true reflection of his warrior mentality: bold, grounded, built for the fight.

settings.custom_liquid:
X1 Key Benefits

Lightweight Power

Agile & Responsive

Designed for explosive energy return. Pilot testing indicated the X1 may generate higher peak ground reaction forces, delivering more powerful jumps, faster acceleration, and superior energy transfer from floor to foot.

Court Grip

Enhanced Traction

With its multidirectional traction pattern, the X1 supports lightning-fast direction changes, quicker reactions, and more agile defense, helping you own every inch of the court.

Balance & Control

Natural Movement

A zero-drop sole keeps you balanced and connected, improving stability, ground awareness, and proprioception for better overall court performance. Every move feels intentional and responsive.

settings.collection_title: “I’ve been wearing Xero Shoes on and off the court. My feet and ankles feel indestructible!”

settings.text: Temi Fágbénlé,  Power Forward, Golden State Valkyries

settings.collection_title: ”I feel like I’m gaining a lot by switching from a standard basketball shoe. I feel very grounded. I play with a lot of force, strength and power, and the Xero Shoes X1 allow me to function as the human body should."
